concept.title: Event Registration for Portal and Public Users
concept.abstract: Once staff users configure the UI and enable publishing in the Community Portal, the event is ready for portal and public registration.

conbody.p: The primary difference between authenticated portal users and unauthenticated portal users is that authenticated portal users enjoy the benefit of their user information autopopulating on the event registration UI. Additionally, authenticated users have saved payment methods, providing them with a swifter registration process. Unauthenticated portal users do not have Community Portal access, but can register for an event via Guest Checkout.

After registering for the intended event, and building their own agenda, portal and public users enter the payment information on the Checkout page. A successful payment generates an email that provides users with the opportunity to further customize their event experience through the Agenda Builder.
